feed.title: Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -17.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -23.3°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
